About SmartHR

With its user-friendly interface and robust functionalities, SmartHR transforms the way HR functions are managed, enabling organizations to enhance efficiency, improve employee management, and ultimately drive sustainable growth

  • HR Solutions: SmartHR streamlines processes, fosters collaboration, and offers actionable insights, eliminating paperwork and inefficiencies.
  • Global Reach: Serving organizations worldwide, SmartHR caters to diverse geographies, ensuring comprehensive support regardless of location.
  • Integration: Seamlessly connecting with JIRA API for Clockfie integration, Zoom for enhanced communication, AWS / Azure / GCP for secure hosting solutions.

Features

Explore our latest HRMS features designed to streamline your workflow and enhance productivity

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Customize it Now” style=”custom” custom_background=”#3e45eb” custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_type=”material” i_icon_material=”vc-material vc-material-arrow_forward” css_animation=”none” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fdreamstechnologies.com%2Fcontact-us%2F|title:Contact%20Us”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”30″ el_class=”colbox”][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Revolutionize workforce location management for enhanced efficiency, ensuring seamless monitoring and control of employee movements within designated areas.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Multi-Branch Management

Streamline operations across multiple entities by efficiently managing employees and resources, facilitating centralized control and coordination for enhanced productivity.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Project Tracking

Simplify project management by effectively monitoring tasks, resources, and progress, ensuring optimal allocation and utilization of resources to meet project milestones.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”30″ el_class=”colbox”][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Recruitment

Streamline the recruitment process from candidate selection to interview staging, with an Applicant Tracking System (ATS) that simplifies applicant management and facilitates seamless progression from resume screening to offer acceptance[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Payroll Management

Automate payroll processing with automatic generation of payslips and payroll inputs, ensuring accurate and timely compensation for the workforce while minimizing administrative overhead[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]
